document_data.name: Nobruzzal
document_data.mainbody: '''Nobruzzal''' was a male [[drow]] [[wizard]] and a student of [[Solom Ned'razak]] at the [[Inverted Tower]] in [[Szith Morcane]].
document_data.Description: A tall and gaunt male [[drow]], Nobruzzal distinguished himself by dressing entirely in black. He wore black boots and [[trousers]], a black shirt, and a black [[cloak]].
document_data.Personality: Nobruzzal was a drow of eclectic tastes in [[magic]], preferring to dabble in all manner of [[schools of magic]] and practices.
document_data.Abilities: A skilled [[wizard]] and the apprentice of [[Solom Ned'razak]], Nobruzzal had researched many [[spell]]s from a variety of schools. In addition, he had studied alchemy and could create a number of [[magic|magical]] [[potion]]s.
document_data.Possessions: As an apprentice of the Inverted Tower, Nobruzzal was denied many possessions as a result of the policy of austerity that his master, Solom, enforced. However, he did keep a snakeskin-bound [[spellbook]] in his room and wore a set of ''[[bracers of armor]]'' and a ''[[ring of protection]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Nobruzzal had a cordial enough relationship with the other members of the [[Inverted Tower]] that he could study alongside them communally.
document_data.History:
As an apprentice of the [[archmage]] Solom Ned'razak in the [[Inverted Tower]], Nobruzzal had spent many years studying the art of wizardry.

In [[1372 DR]], Nobruzzal was present when [[House Morcane]] fell to [[Kiaransalee]]an cultists and the arrival of refugees from [[Maerimydra]]. Despite these disturbances to [[Szith Morcane]]'s society, Nobruzzal and the rest of his colleagues in the Inverted Tower were left largely unaffected.
